name: A Landfill
description:
It started from messing around with conditional dialog syntax. Read my development blog below for more detail.

A mini adventure game taking place somewhere in a landfill. Help me improve this game by commenting or rating.

How to play

  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Walk into to an object to interact

This game was made for November 2017 Bitsy Jam with a theme 'Bric-A-Brac'
https://itch.io/jam/bric-a-brac
